solutions.descriptionText: I spent long nights sitting here reading and researching botany before I died...
No one has watered these in a long time...
These pesky plants always end up blocking my way when they haven't been watered
I really should have moved these plants away from the shelves. Good thing it didn't break something this time. Last time I wasn't as lucky...
These rare plants produce a poisonous gas. If only the glass hadn't broke... I could have continued my research.
